title: marigold_companion_planting_observation
summary: Marigold flowers planted near vegetable beds to support pest control and improve farm ecosystem aesthetics.
description: This record documents marigold flowers cultivated adjacent to vegetable plots at MaMeeFarm. The planting serves dual purposes: natural pest deterrence through companion planting practices and enhancement of visual and ecological vitality within the farm environment.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
